name: Coconut Cake IV
author: dannis
summary: This cake is soooo good and moist you should make two...that way you can be sure to get some. I take it to work and it disappears really fast.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease and flour a 10-inch tube pan
Mix flour, baking powder, and salt together and set aside
Beat butter and sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until light and fluffy
The mixture should be noticeably lighter in color
Add the room-temperature eggs one at a time, allowing each egg to blend into the butter mixture before adding the next
Pour in the flour mixture alternately with the buttermilk, mixing until just incorporated
Fold in coconut, mixing just enough to evenly combine
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 1 hour, or until a toothpick inserted into the cake comes out clean
